name: Prison Break
author: Abdul Vaiz
description: You find yourself confined in a dreary prison cell with only a bed, a desk, and a locked door. Your mission: Escape from this seemingly impenetrable prison.
finishmessage: Congratulations! You've successfully escaped the prison.

locations.name: Prison Cell
locations.description: Your surroundings are bleakâ€”a bed, a desk, and a closed door that taunts you. Your journey to freedom begins here.

locations.name: Corridor
locations.description: You step into a dimly lit corridor. A single door stands between you and freedom.

item.name: bed
item.description: A simple bed that appears surprisingly comfortable. A potential refuge in your quest for freedom.

canTake.message: Attempting to take the bed is futile; it's firmly fixed to the ground.

canSearch.message: Searching the bed yields nothing of interest, but you contemplate using it for a stealthy nap.

canSleep.message: You decide to take a moment to rest on the bed.

item.name: desk
item.description: A plain desk with a closed drawer. It might hold the key to your escape.

search.message: You search the desk and discover a closed drawer.

canSearch.message: You search the desk, revealing a closed drawer.

search.message: Your search reveals a key hidden in the drawer.

canSearch.message: You can't search the drawer, but you can open it (command: open drawer).

item.name: drawer
item.description: A closed drawer that piques your curiosity.

canOpen.message: You open the drawer, revealing a key.

open.message: The drawer is open, and you find a key inside.

item.name: key
item.description: A key crucial for unlocking the corridor door and securing your escape.

canTake.message: You take the key, recognizing its potential significance.

item.name: Key Cellprison
item.description: A key specifically designed to unlock the door to your prison cell.

canTake.message: You take the key, sensing its importance in your quest for freedom.

item.name: door_corr
item.description: A locked door blocking your path in the corridor.

canEnter.message: You can't enter; the door is locked.

canUnlock.message: Using the key, you successfully unlock the door.

open.message: The door swings open, marking your path to freedom.

item.name: door_cell
item.description: The entrance to your prison cell, firmly locked.

canUnlock.message: With the keycell in hand, you unlock the door.

canEnter.message: You successfully enter the corridor, leaving your cell behind.

item.name: guard
item.description: A vigilant guard monitoring your every move.

canTalk.message: You cautiously wake up the guard.

angry.message: The guard, now angered, ignores your presence.

normal.message: The guard remains vigilant and alert.

sleep.message: The guard appears to be sound asleep.

search.message: You search the guard and find a key concealed on their person.

canSearch.message: You search the guard and discover a key hidden on their person.

event.name: angry_guard
event.description: The guard is alerted to your actions, becoming visibly angry.

effects.message: Hey you prisoner! What are you doing?
The guard forcefully closes the door, restricting your actions.

canUnlock.message: The guard watches you closely, preventing any attempts to unlock or open the door.

canOpen.message: The guard remains vigilant, making it impossible to open the door.

canEnter.message: The guard's watchful eyes prevent any attempts to enter the corridor.

event.name: Wake Up In Mid Night
event.description: You suddenly wake up in the eerie silence of midnight.

effects.message: The guard is now sound asleep, granting you a moment of respite.
Surprisingly, the door is now unlocked, providing an opportunity for your escape.

canUnlock.message: Utilizing the keycell, you successfully unlock the door.

canEnter.message: Seizing the moment, you enter the corridor, leaving your cell behind.

event.name: Guard Wakeup
event.description: You cautiously wake up the guard, triggering a sense of anger and hostility.

effects.message: The guard, now angered, directs their attention towards you.
The door remains locked, limiting your options.

canUnlock.message: Utilizing the keycell, you successfully unlock the door.

canEnter.message: Capitalizing on the unlocked door, you enter the corridor, leaving your cell behind.
